column5: Yep, I read that on another board this morning, found it surprising.
Yep, I read that on another board this morning, found it surprising.
thin film of ice on Red this morning as tempretures reached -15C. It's suppose to warm up to 10C on Tuesday then I think it wont be long after that till its short rod season.

OK are any of you real diehards still fishing the Red?
OK are any of you real diehards still fishing the Red?
Fished it Friday and Saturday. Lots and lots and lots of saugers. No piggies for me but saw a few being pulled in. Roger
Fished it Friday and Saturday. Lots and lots and lots of saugers. No piggies for me but saw a few being pulled in. Roger
I am planning to Saturday thru Tuesday, I can handle cold, But I have to drive eight hours to get there. I want to make sure its fishable Keep me posted if the ramps become unusable, Thanks

In Selkirk, I doubt that you will find a dock in the water. Maybe the best place to launch would be at Stu's. Roger
